rooms.name: Mullai
rooms.description: The central courtyard (Nalukettu) serving as the heart of the home; incorporates garden and water feature per Vastu for harmony with nature.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the Mullai, a spacious living area featuring traditional Kerala-style woodwork, intricate carvings, and large windows aligning with Vastu guidelines for light flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected with the Living Room; features low dining tables and comfortable seating in line with cultural norms.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala kitchen layout with an emphasis on ventilation, natural lighting, and open plan design for ease of movement, following local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom featuring a private balcony overlooking the Mullai, with Vastu-aligned direction placement for prosperity and calm.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-sized bedroom with traditional Kerala-style window detailing and orientation as per Vastu for health and well-being.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Simpler design bedroom incorporating local materials and natural light, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles of energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area on the ground floor with a separate entrance for domestic staff; ensures privacy while fulfilling functional requirements.

openings.description: Large, wooden windows installed along walls for natural ventilation and light as per Kerala architecture.
Traditional wooden doors with carvings aligning with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow throughout the home.
Designated openings connecting the living spaces to the central courtyard, emphasizing seamless indoor-outdoor transition.
